thread.title: The mysterious death of conspiracy theorist Max Spiers
thread.title_full: The mysterious death of conspiracy theorist Max Spiers

title: The mysterious death of conspiracy theorist Max Spiers
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device The mysterious death of conspiracy theorist Max Spiers 25 February 2017 Last updated at 00:48 GMT 
British conspiracy theorist Max Spiers died in Poland in July 2016. 
He believed he had superhuman abilities and that his mind had been altered as a child. 
India Rakusen investigates how he died.
